entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 this morning. High 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain or ice pellets beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
